data.feedback: The Planning Agent has created a comprehensive, well-structured plan that covers ALL 9 epics requested by the user. File paths are accurate (verified via Read tool), backend API alignment is correct, and the execution order is logical. Minor issues (duplicate dependencies) are non-blocking.

issues.description: epic-ui-foundation has duplicate dependency 'epic-flutter-foundation' in dependencies array
epic-realtime-client has excessive dependencies (6+), some may be implicit
Firebase config files (google-services.json, GoogleService-Info.plist) are typically generated from Firebase Console
issues.recommendation: Document that these need Firebase project setup first

suggestions: Consider adding a story for settings/profile screen in a future epic
Consider adding offline caching strategy (Hive/SQLite) for step data
The goal_model.dart should include both GroupGoal and GroupGoalMembership entities to match backend
